msg.msgText: NOTES: 1. "Name" is a required item. 2. "HostRestriction" restricts access to the specified hosts. If you leave this field empty, then you allow communication with all IP addresses. Specify a comma-separated list of hostnames or addresses. To specify a subnet, use a Classless Inter-Domain Routing (CIDR) IP address or host name. 3. Each "Key=value" pair must be enclosed within double quotation marks.

msgExplanation.p: This message is the text of a command help.
